Text: O.k., I have been using Dvdfab for many years, but I don't understand how to use the new ones? Are you supposed to connect to the internet? With one old ones you never did? Can someone help me?

exactly bro,new v 9  needs to be connected to internet,otherwise few functions/Options will not work and thus your software will only work in restricted mode.
v 8 does not need it but sometimes may fail for certain bd or dvd.
regards
seems to be working just fine. thanks
